name: Time and Tide
description:
This is my our entry for the Brackeys Game Jam,

WASD - To Move   SPACEBAR To Jump 
Mouse to Rotate
Mouse Wheel to Zoom

It is a short adventure that explores the concept of death and grief, in a light hearted way, I truly hope it comes across as intended.

I am Pete I did the majority of everything, my main interest is environment design and you can find some of my work here.
https://www.artstation.com/rattuspuer

but I got my friend Denno G who is an established Hip Hop producer but dabbles in movie scores amongst other stuff to work on the Sound track and if I do say so he did a wonderful job, and was fully on board with the project conceptually.

Check his music out here: https://soundcloud.com/denbryonic
